_xResult.title: White Flare Pants with Slit Legs
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made pants with wide flare leg
_xResult.longdesc:
Put on your clean act in this front slit flared bootleg white pants. Made in viscose crepe, it is definitely one of a kind. Falls perfectly on your body, highlights the shape of your legs and is super comfortable. These classic white pants are enough to cover your business looks and your brunch dates! You can pair this with a satin blouse for a formal event and with a cute crop top for a date look.

You can customise the length of the pant, the slit length you want and the circumference of the flare as well. Plus it has colour option too.

 

Available in Black, Red and Mustard
